description: Notice of permitted development of telecommunications apparatus comprising: Proposed upgrade to the existing telecommunications apparatus. Proposed EE 3No. MHA's to be installed on rear of existing antenna support poles. Proposed EE 3No. combiners to be installed on existing gantry pole. Proposed EE 1No. Airo cabinet to be installed on existing concrete base. Proposed EE 3No. Mk2 BOB's to be mounted on existing 3m high support pole. Proposed EE 3No. ERS4419 to be mounted on existing 3m high support pole within existing protective cage. Existing feeder management to be utilised. H3G & EE 6No. LDF5-50 & 18No. LCF78-50 feeders (subject to testing). EE 2No. Mk1 BOB's to be removed. EE 1No. cabinet to be removed. EE 3No. MHA's to be removed. EE 3No. RRU to be removed. H3G & EE 1No. fibre cable to be removed and associated ancillary works
site_name: Telecommunications Mast Adj Parker HousePowerscroft RoadSidcupKent
